column1: Little Goat Diner////Came yesterday right before a Blackhawks game. It was a Monday late afternoon so wasn't super busy. Â Got seated right away. Our server gave us plenty of time to look over the menu. (We were quite indecisive!) He also chatted and cracked a few jokes with us
column2: which was nice. We ended up getting the hot crab dip with Ritz crackers. Soooo delicious! Was hot and bubbly when it came out. Do ask for more crackers - 8 is not enough. Mac 'n cheese was divine. Love the bread crumbs on top. And the Reuben sandwich. Very interesting taste with kimchi inside. All in all
column3: a good "diner" experience! The bathrooms are really clean and nice
